headline.main: HEROIC RESCUE WINS MEDALS FOR 2 FLIERS; Trapped Crewmen Saved in U.S. Bomber in Sea Off New Guinea

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN AUSTRALIA, May 2 (AP) -- A pilot and his co-pilot, who succeeded after a valiant fight in rescuing trapped crewmen from a sinking plane in waters off New Guinea, were awarded the Soliders Medal today.
